title: Shinohara Chie The Best Selection
original_name: 篠原千絵 The Best Selection
sinopse:
Volume 1

1. Kootta Natsu no Hi (Frozen Summer Day)
2. Yasashii Satsujinsha (Kind Killer)
3. Houmonsha wa Mayonaka ni (Someone in the Dark - A Midnight Visitor)
4. Mokugekisha ni Sayounara
5. Weekend no Shoutaijou (Weekend Invitation)
6. Nemuru Machi (The Sleeping Town)

Volume 2

1. Jisatsushitsu Room Number 404
2. When the Bell Rings
3. Crystal Doll
4. Fuyu no Hana (Winter Flowers)
5. Akai Densetsu (Red Legend)
